Articles.Content: are there any mods for larger diameter SRBs out there? When I want to launch large rockets I have to either use expensive liquid fuel or have a rocket with so many boosters and parts that it's unflyable. I have looked through mods and posts but haven't found anything. Ideally it would be near stock just 3m or 5m diameter

https://github.com/Swamp-Ig/ProceduralParts

Procedural SRB. Lets you define the size, thrust, etc.

KW has some http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51037-0-25-KW-Rocketry-v2-6d2-Available-0-25-Compatibility!-16-10-2014 and NOVAPunch http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/3870 and CMES has some big parts http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64993-0-90-Chaka-Monkey-Exploration-Odyssey-0-27-1-EFT-1-Commemorative-Edition and you could just rescale them.

EDIT- And if you want the Stock NASA ones here is a cfg that will add 2 more sizes. https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/Big_MassiveSRB.cfg.zip

Edited January 11, 2015 by Mecripp2
Also SpaceY for more bang for your buck
